description:
## Model Family Registration

Registers a family of related models or components that share code.

**Prerequisites:** None â€” submit before Stage 3 or 4 if needed.

> [!NOTE]
> Please ensure you are familiar with the completion guidance in the collapsible dropdown where it exists. Failure to do so will result in a failed submission.
> To modify an existing entry, see __[modifying entries](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/Essential-Model-Documentation/tree/production?tab=contributing-ov-file#2-modifying-or-reusing-existing-entries)__.

label: Family Name
description: The short identifier for this model family.

label: Family Type
description: Whether this is a coupled Earth System family or a single-domain Component family.

label: Description
description: A description of what characterizes this model family including scientific focus and common code.
placeholder:
1. Scientific focus and approach
2. Common code base and physics
3. How family members differ

label: Primary Institution
description: The lead institution responsible for development of this family.

label: Collaborative Institutions
description: Other institutions contributing to the development of this family. **Select multiple.**

label: Scientific Domains
description: All scientific domains covered by any member of this family. **Select multiple.**

label: Year Established
description: The year when this family was first developed.

label: Representative Member
description: A well-known configuration from this family that serves as a representative example.

label: Website
description: The official documentation URL for this family.

label: Reference DOIs
description: The DOI URLs for family-level publications.

label: Additional Collaborators
description: To add attribution to additional members include their GitHub usernames (only) separated by a comma.

---

## Issue Handling

**After submission:**
- Creates `model_family` entry
- Earth System Families can be referenced in Stage 4 (Model)
- Component Families can be referenced in Stage 3 (Model Component)
- [Track progress in issue comments](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/Essential-Model-Documentation/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20author%3A%40me)

label: Issue Kind
description: Whether this is a new submission or a modification to an existing entry.
